articles.title: 'The worst is yet to come': IMF cuts global and euro area growth outlook - Euronews
articles.description: Overall, the global economy should grow by 2.7%, down 0.2% compared to the previous forecast. #EuropeNews
articles.content: The euro area's economy is now expected to grow by just 0.5% in 2023 as factors including the war in Ukraine, record inflation and the continued impact of the COVID-19 pandemic weigh on the outlook, … [+2543 chars]
